_header: Toward Aurora in the month of December
_description: ‘Experience shewith the wourld is varyable’ — fourteen 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc), including envoy, with this refrain

BLHar2255.First Lines:
TOward Aurora in the monyth of decembreWalkyng alloone in
                    contemplacioun…
BLHar2255.Last Lines:
…Envye feerfull for devyne IugementExperience shewith the
                    wourld is varyable
BLHar2255.Attributed Author:
Explicit quod lydgate (f. 128v, in margin, in
                    rubric)
BLHar2255.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble,
                        ed.  
             John Lydgate: The Minor Poems, Vol. II: Secular Poems.
EETS
         o.s. 192 (1934); repr. 1961: 844-7.
